title: Five-Star Southern Thailand Private Beachfront Villas with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the pinnacle of secluded romance at X2 Kui Buri Resort, a five-star sanctuary ideally located on the northern part of the Malay Peninsula in Prachuap Khiri Khan. Tucked away along the pristine beachfront, just under four hours from vibrant Bangkok, this luxury resort is a haven of seclusion surrounded by lush tropical greenery, with the Gulf of Thailand at its doorstep. When you're not relaxing beachside, retreat to the privacy of just 24 intimate sanctuaries scattered along the pristine coastline.

Make the most of the resort’s luxurious amenities, which include an expansive 200sqm swimming pool overlooking the glistening waves, onsite petanque, bicycle and watersport hire, and a tranquil spa. Enjoy an all-day culinary experience at 4K Restaurant and, in the evening, sample expertly crafted cocktails at the serene 4K Bar.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights only):**

- Prepare for a day of indulgence with **daily à la carte breakfast**
- Celebrate your escape with a **nightly cocktail each** at 4K Bar
- Embark on a delicious culinary adventure with a **three-course dinner** for two (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Unwind with **one 60-minute massage per person** at X2 Spa (for stays of 5+ nights)
offer_address: 52 Moo 13, Ao Noi, Muang, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77210, Thailand
